name: Close Your Eyes (itch) (SodiumNickel)
description:
Made for Trijam #116, with the theme "Stay there, don't move!"

"Close Your Eyes" is a strategy game similar to red light - green light. You are only allowed to move when the eye is closed. However, there's a twist. You can only see when the eye is open. Try your best to memorize the room's layout when the eye is open, and navigate through the dark, avoiding spikes.

How to Play

Your goal is to make it all the way to the right of the grid without running into spikes, or being caught by the eye.

You can control the character with WASD or the arrow keys, and can move once every second (there is a circle indicator in the upper right to show each time you can move).

This same radial timer will also count down when the eye is about to open so keep an eye out for that.

Press and hold down escape to exit out of the application.
